game.name: Reconquista
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 근접 전투, 마법, 시드 기반으로 생성된 레벨을 특징으로 하는 빠르게 진행되는 던전 부머 슈터.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast-paced dungeon boomer shooter with melee combat, magic, and seed-based generated levels.
